full_summary:
**Net, Cargo Tie-Down, Aircraft Pallet Tender**

**Reference:** CB-453-26690964
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247908/A
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2024 2:00 PM (ET)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 17, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contract Information:**

The Department of National Defence requires the supply of aircraft equipment as follows:

* **Item 1:** Net, Cargo Tie-Down, Aircraft (GSIN: 1670), QTY: 1000 EA, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery Location: Canadian Air & Airspace Warfare Centre (CAAWC) Trenton
* **Item 2:** Net, Cargo Tie-Down, Aircraft (GSIN: 1670), QTY: 500 EA, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery Location: Canadian Air & Airspace Warfare Centre (CAAWC) Trenton

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their proposals in either English or French. Electronic bids are strongly encouraged due to current COVID-19 pandemic restrictions.

**Documentation:**

The bid solicitation document is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27139/w8485-247908-netcargo-tiedown-bid-solicitation-(en).pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27139/w8485-247908-netcargo-tiedown-bid-solicitation-(en).pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27139/w8485-247908-netcargo-tiedown-bid-solicitation-(fr).pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27139/w8485-247908-netcargo-tiedown-bid-solicitation-(fr).pdf)

**Contact Information:**

* Dany Lebel
* Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

Note:
